thread.title: Facebook to load news faster on your phone with Instant Articles

title: Facebook to load news faster on your phone with Instant Articles
text:
Facebook to load news faster on your phone with Instant Articles 
thestar.com Thursday 22nd October, 2015 
Facebook launches Instant Articles, is working with news organizations to give their articles preferential treatment so news stories load faster on phones....
